titleStmt.title: Good news from the English fleet being an account of a great bloody engagement which hapned yesterday betwixt Their Majesties fleet commanded by the Earl of Torrington and the French fleet, near the Beachy, upon the coast of Suffolk : with a particular relation of the blowing-up of six of the biggest of the French men of war ...

Good news from the English fleet being an account of a great bloody engagement which hapned yesterday betwixt Their Majesties fleet commanded by the Earl of Torrington and the French fleet, near the Beachy, upon the coast of Suffolk : with a particular relation of the blowing-up of six of the biggest of the French men of war ...

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
